23-001HR.summary: Recommendation to approve minutes for the Equity and Human Relations Commission Regular Meeting of Wednesday, December 7, 2022.A motion was made by Commissioner Covington, seconded by Commissioner Lara, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 12 - Cory Allen, Sharifa Batts, Trace Camacho, Christopher Covington, Zuleimy Delgadillo, Lissette Flores, Keyona Montgomery, Eduardo Lara, Zoe Nicholson, Jon Schultz, Amy Eriksen and Alyssa GutierrezAbsent: 2 - Robbie Butler and Chanel SmithPUBLIC COMMENTVice Chair Eriksen spoke.Bill Sive spoke. CHAIR REMARKSVice Chair Eriksen provided opening remarks.OFFICE OF EQUITY REMARKSTony Viramontes, Equity & Community Engagement Program Specialist, spoke. Teresa Chandler, Deputy City Manager, spoke.
